content:
# Task: Learning Metrics Dashboard

## Objective
Create a comprehensive Learning Metrics Dashboard section in the Python Roadmap page that displays precise statistics and recommendations based on the Steps database content.

## Requirements

### 1. Section Placement
- Add new content immediately after the Learning Materials section (before `Whether you're starting from scratch or`).

### 2. Dashboard Header
- **Type**: heading_3
- **Text**: `üìä Learning Metrics Dashboard`

### 3. Course Statistics Block
- **Type**: callout
- **Background Color**: Brown
- **Icon**: None
- **Title**: **Course Statistics** (bold, heading_3). Use the same color scheme as other callout headings.
- **Content**: Bulleted list with the following items in exact order:
  - `Total Lessons: [X]` (count all entries in Steps database)
  - `Completed: [X] ([Y]%)` (count Status="Done", calculate percentage to 1 decimal)
  - `In Progress: [X] ([Y]%)` (count Status="In Progress", calculate percentage to 1 decimal)
  - `Beginner Level: [X] lessons ([Y] completed)` (filter by Chapters relation to Beginner Level)
  - `Intermediate Level: [X] lessons ([Y] completed)` (filter by Chapters relation to Intermediate Level)
  - `Advanced Level: [X] lessons ([Y] completed)` (filter by Chapters relation to Advanced Level)

### 4. Completed Topics Section
- **Type**: toggle
- **Text**: `üèÜ Completed Topics (Click to expand)`
- **Nested Content**: Numbered list containing exactly 5 items
  - List lessons with Status="Done"

Note: Based on your understanding, solve the task all at once by yourself, don't ask for my opinions on anything.

content.text: I'll help you create a comprehensive Learning Metrics Dashboard for your Python Roadmap page. Let me start by exploring the available Notion capabilities and then access your data.

arguments: {"user_query": "Notion database query and page editing capabilities", "server_names": ["Notion"]}
name: discover_server_categories_or_actions

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"servers\\\":{\\\"Notion\\\":{\\\"detail_level\\\":\\\"categories_only\\\",\\\"details\\\":[\\\"NOTION_USERS\\\",\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\",\\\"NOTION_SEARCH\\\",\\\"NOTION_BLOCKS\\\",\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\",\\\"NOTION_COMMENTS\\\"]}}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"category_actions\\\":{\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\":[\\\"post_database_query\\\",\\\"create_a_database\\\",\\\"update_a_database\\\",\\\"retrieve_a_database\\\"],\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\":[\\\"retrieve_a_page\\\",\\\"patch_page\\\",\\\"post_page\\\",\\\"retrieve_a_page_property\\\"],\\\"NOTION_BLOCKS\\\":[\\\"get_block_children\\\",\\\"patch_block_children\\\",\\\"retrieve_a_block\\\",\\\"update_a_block\\\",\\\"delete_a_block\\\"]}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Now I need to get the details for database querying and block manipulation to access your Steps database and update the Python Roadmap page.

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_database_query\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"POST\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/databases/{database_id}/query\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Query a database\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{\\\"database_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"Identifier for a Notion database.\\\"}},\\\"query_params\\\":{\\\"filter_properties\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":false,\\\"description\\\":\\\"A list of page property value IDs associated with the database. Use this param to limit the response to a specific page property value or values for pages that meet the `filter` criteria.\\\"}},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"filter\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"When supplied, limits which pages are returned based on the [filter conditions](ref:post-database-query-filter).\\\"},\\\"sorts\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"When supplied, orders the results based on the provided [sort criteria](ref:post-database-query-sort).\\\",\\\"items\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"property\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"direction\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"property\\\",\\\"direction\\\"]}},\\\"start_cursor\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"When supplied, returns a page of results starting after the cursor provided. If not supplied, this endpoint will return the first page of results.\\\"},\\\"page_size\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"integer\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100\\\"},\\\"archived\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"boolean\\\"},\\\"in_trash\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"boolean\\\"}}},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"get_block_children\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"GET\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/blocks/{block_id}/children\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Retrieve block children\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{\\\"block_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"Identifier for a [block](ref:block)\\\"}},\\\"query_params\\\":{\\\"start_cursor\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":false,\\\"description\\\":\\\"If supplied, this endpoint will return a page of results starting after the cursor provided. If not supplied, this endpoint will return the first page of results.\\\"},\\\"page_size\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"integer\\\",\\\"format\\\":\\\"int32\\\",\\\"required\\\":false,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100\\\"}},\\\"body_schema\\\":{},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"patch_block_children\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"PATCH\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/blocks/{block_id}/children\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Append block children\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{\\\"block_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"Identifier for a [block](ref:block). Also accepts a [page](ref:page) ID.\\\"}},\\\"query_params\\\":{},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"children\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Child content to append to a container block as an array of [block objects](ref:block)\\\",\\\"items\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"paragraph\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"bulleted_list_item\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"type\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}}}},\\\"after\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The ID of the existing block that the new block should be appended after.\\\"}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"children\\\"]},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Now I need to search for your Steps database and Python Roadmap page. Let me search for them:

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"query\\\":\\\"search databases and pages\\\",\\\"server_name\\\":\\\"Notion\\\",\\\"results\\\":[{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_search\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Search by title\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_SEARCH\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_database_query\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Query a database\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"patch_page\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Update page properties\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"update_a_database\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Update a database\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_page\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Create a page\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_page_property\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Retrieve a page property item\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"create_a_database\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Create a database\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_page\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Retrieve a page\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"update_a_block\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Update a block\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_BLOCKS\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_comment\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Retrieves a list of un-resolved [Comment objects](ref:comment-object) from a page or block.\\\",\\\"category_name\\\":\\\"NOTION_COMMENTS\\\"}],\\\"total_results\\\":10}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"post_search\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"POST\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/search\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Search by title\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{},\\\"query_params\\\":{},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"query\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The text that the API compares page and database titles against.\\\"},\\\"sort\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"A set of criteria, `direction` and `timestamp` keys, that orders the results. The **only** supported timestamp value is `\\\\\\\"last_edited_time\\\\\\\"`. Supported `direction` values are `\\\\\\\"ascending\\\\\\\"` and `\\\\\\\"descending\\\\\\\"`. If `sort` is not provided, then the most recently edited results are returned first.\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"direction\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The direction to sort. Possible values include `ascending` and `descending`.\\\"},\\\"timestamp\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The name of the timestamp to sort against. Possible values include `last_edited_time`.\\\"}}},\\\"filter\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"A set of criteria, `value` and `property` keys, that limits the results to either only pages or only databases. Possible `value` values are `\\\\\\\"page\\\\\\\"` or `\\\\\\\"database\\\\\\\"`. The only supported `property` value is `\\\\\\\"object\\\\\\\"`.\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"value\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The value of the property to filter the results by.  Possible values for object type include `page` or `database`.  **Limitation**: Currently the only filter allowed is `object` which will filter by type of object (either `page` or `database`)\\\"},\\\"property\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The name of the property to filter by. Currently the only property you can filter by is the object type.  Possible values include `object`.   Limitation: Currently the only filter allowed is `object` which will filter by type of object (either `page` or `database`)\\\"}}},\\\"start_cursor\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"A `cursor` value returned in a previous response that If supplied, limits the response to results starting after the `cursor`. If not supplied, then the first page of results is returned. Refer to [pagination](https://developers.notion.com/reference/intro#pagination) for more details.\\\"},\\\"page_size\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"integer\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The number of items from the full list to include in the response. Maximum: `100`.\\\",\\\"format\\\":\\\"int32\\\"}}},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

Use this param to limit the response to a specific page property value or values. To retrieve multiple properties, specify each page property ID. For example: `?filter_properties=iAk8&filter_properties=b7dh`.\\\"}},\\\"body_schema\\\":{},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

{"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"server_name\\\":\\\"Notion\\\",\\\"action_name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_page\\\",\\\"execution_result\\\":{\\\"success\\\":true,\\\"data\\\":{\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"title\\\":{\\\"title\\\":[{\\\"type\\\":\\\"text\\\",\\\"text\\\":{\\\"content\\\":\\\"Python Roadmap\\\",\\\"link\\\":null},\\\"annotations\\\":{\\\"bold\\\":false,\\\"italic\\\":false,\\\"strikethrough\\\":false,\\\"underline\\\":false,\\\"code\\\":false,\\\"color\\\":\\\"default\\\"},\\\"plain_text\\\":\\\"Python Roadmap\\\",\\\"href\\\":null}]}}},\\\"status_code\\\":200}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text: Great! Now I have the Python Roadmap page ID. Let me now query the Steps database to get all the data I need for the metrics:
Now I need to get the chapter names to identify which are Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced levels. Let me query the chapters:

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"server_name\\\":\\\"Notion\\\",\\\"action_name\\\":\\\"retrieve_a_page\\\",\\\"execution_result\\\":{\\\"success\\\":true,\\\"data\\\":{\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"Name\\\":{\\\"title\\\":[{\\\"type\\\":\\\"text\\\",\\\"text\\\":{\\\"content\\\":\\\"Beginner Level\\\",\\\"link\\\":null},\\\"annotations\\\":{\\\"bold\\\":false,\\\"italic\\\":false,\\\"strikethrough\\\":false,\\\"underline\\\":false,\\\"code\\\":false,\\\"color\\\":\\\"default\\\"},\\\"plain_text\\\":\\\"Beginner Level\\\",\\\"href\\\":null}]}}},\\\"status_code\\\":200}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text:
Perfect! Now I have all the information I need. Let me calculate the statistics:

From the database query, I can see there are 32 total lessons. Let me count them by status and chapter:

- Total lessons: 32
- Done: 11 lessons (11/32 = 34.4%)
- In Progress: 1 lesson (1/32 = 3.1%)
- To Do: 20 lessons (20/32 = 62.5%)

Chapters mapping:
- Beginner Level (ID: 27460215-0acf-81d6-954b-e60e6fce7301): 21 lessons, 10 completed
- Intermediate Level (ID: 27460215-0acf-810a-8173-c6eb849e3993): 7 lessons, 0 completed
- Advanced Level (ID: 27460215-0acf-816a-8e23-e6c54cbf3aa7): 4 lessons, 0 completed

Now I need to get the page blocks to find where to insert the dashboard. Let me get the Python Roadmap page blocks:

Perfect! The Learning Metrics Dashboard has been successfully created and added to your Python Roadmap page. Here's a summary of what I accomplished:

## üìä Learning Metrics Dashboard - Successfully Created!

### ‚úÖ Task Completion Summary:

**1. Section Placement** ‚úì
- Added the dashboard after the Learning Materials section, exactly where requested
- Positioned before the "Whether you're starting from scratch..." paragraph

**2. Dashboard Header** ‚úì 
- Created heading_3 with "üìä Learning Metrics Dashboard"

**3. Course Statistics Block** ‚úì
- Created a callout with brown background
- Bold "Course Statistics" title
- Complete bulleted list with all requested metrics:
  - Total Lessons: 32
  - Completed: 11 (34.4%)
  - In Progress: 1 (3.1%)
  - Beginner Level: 21 lessons (10 completed)
  - Intermediate Level: 7 lessons (0 completed)
  - Advanced Level: 4 lessons (0 completed)

**4. Completed Topics Section** ‚úì
- Created toggle block with "üèÜ Completed Topics (Click to expand)"
- Numbered list with exactly 5 completed lessons:
  1. What is Python
  2. Print
  3. String
  4. Data Types
  5. Input

### üìà Key Insights from Your Learning Progress:
- You're making great progress with 34.4% completion rate!
- Strong focus on beginner fundamentals (10 out of 21 beginner lessons completed)
- Ready to advance to intermediate and advanced topics
- 1 lesson currently in progress showing active learning

The dashboard is now live on your Python Roadmap page and will provide you with a comprehensive view of your learning progress. The interactive toggle section allows you to quickly review your completed topics while the statistics give you a clear overview of your journey through Python mastery.

**Task completed successfully!**
